resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108097</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108097</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205651</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">California Gold: Northern California Folk Arts from the Thirties</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kalifornien Gold: Nordkalifornien 
Volkskünste von den dreißiger Jahren</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Or de la Californie : Arts folkloriques 
nordiques de la Californie des années '30</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ouro De Califórnia: Artes populares do norte
de Califórnia dos thirties</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Oro Della California: Arti pieghe nordiche 
della California dai thirties</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χρυσός Καλιφόρνιας: Βόρειες λαϊκές τέχνες 
Καλιφόρνιας από τις δεκαετίες του '30</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Oro De California: Artes populares norteños 
de California a partir de los años 30</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">is a multi-format ethnographic field collection project, undertaken during the New Deal, that includes sound recordings, still photographs, drawings, and written documents from a variety of European ethnic and English- and Spanish-speaking communities in Northern California.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ist ein Multiformat, das ethnographisch ist, 
auffangen das Ansammlung Projekt, aufgenommen während des 
neuen Abkommens, das Tonaufnahmen, ruhige Fotographien, Zeichnungen 
und schriftliche Dokumente von einer Vielzahl der europäischen 
ethnischen und englischen und spanischsprechenden Gemeinschaften in 
Nordkalifornien einschließt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">est un projet ethnographique de collection de zone 
de multi-format, entrepris pendant la nouvelle affaire, qui inclut les
enregistrements sonores, les photographies immobiles, les schémas, et
les documents écrits d'une variété des communautés ethniques et 
anglaises et de langue espagnole européennes en Californie nordique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">é um projeto ethnographic da coleção do campo do
multi-formato, empreendido durante o negócio novo, que inclui 
gravações sadias, fotografias imóveis, desenhos, e originais 
escritos de uma variedade de comunidades étnicas e inglesas e 
spanish-speaking européias em Califórnia do norte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">è un progetto ethnographic dell'accumulazione del 
campo di multi-formato, intrapreso durante il nuovo affare, che 
include le registrazioni del suono, le fotografie tranquille, le 
illustrazioni ed i documenti redatti da una varietà di Comunità 
etniche ed inglesi e di lingua spagnola europee nella California del 
Nord.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">είναι ένα εθνογραφικό πρόγραμμα συλλογής πεδίων 
πολυ-μορφής, που αναλαμβάνεται κατά τη διάρκεια της νέας 
διαπραγμάτευσης, η οποία περιλαμβάνει τις υγιείς καταγραφές, 
ακόμα φωτογραφίες, σχέδια, και γραπτά έγγραφα από ποικίλους 
ευρωπαϊκούς εθνικό και αγγλικά - και ισπανόφωνες κοινότητες σε 
βόρεια Καλιφόρνια.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">es un proyecto etnográfico de la colección del 
campo del multi-formato, emprendido durante el nuevo reparto, que 
incluye grabaciones de sonidos, las fotografías inmóviles, los 
gráficos, y los documentos escritos de una variedad de comunidades 
étnicas e inglesas y de habla hispana europeas en California 
norteña.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205651</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108097</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/california-gold-northern-california-folk-arts-from-the-thirties</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
